sentences.en: "I don't understand," the Inspector mumbled, passing a hand through his hair.
sentences.cn: “我不明白，”巡官一边嘟囔道，一边用手捋了一下头发。

sentences.en: Back at the station the Chief Inspector returned the call.
sentences.cn: 探长回到警察局后回了电话。

sentences.en: Has Inspector Fayard put you in the picture?
sentences.cn: 法亚尔督察把情况都告诉你了吗？

sentences.en: I can deal direct with your Inspector Kimble.
sentences.cn: 我可以跟你们的金布尔巡官当面交谈。

sentences.en: I got on the phone to Inspector Joplin at Scotland Yard.
sentences.cn: 我与伦敦警察厅的乔普林巡官通过电话了。

sentences.en: Inspector Banbury came up to see her, but she sent him away.
sentences.cn: 班伯里巡官过来看她，却被她打发走了。

sentences.en: Last week gunmen attacked Mogadishu airport killing a police inspector.
sentences.cn: 上周持枪歹徒袭击了摩加迪沙机场，杀死了一名警察巡官。

sentences.en: She might expose his crooked business deals to her tax inspector brother.
sentences.cn: 她可能会向当税务稽查员的哥哥揭发他那些不正当的交易。

sentences.en: Standards of discipline at the school were strongly criticized in the inspector’s report.
sentences.cn: 督察员在报告里狠狠地批评了这所学校的纪律水准。

sentences.en: The Chief Inspector disliked being overburdened with insignificant detail.
sentences.cn: 总督察讨厌在细枝末节上没完没了地纠缠。

sentences.en: The document was duly signed by the inspector.
sentences.cn: 这份文件已由检查员签妥。

sentences.en: The inspector dutifully recorded the date in a large red book.
sentences.cn: 检查员很尽职地在一本大红册子上记下了日期。

sentences.en: The Inspector opened the packet of cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 检查员撕开了那包香烟。

sentences.en: The Inspector took out a handker-chief and mopped his brow.
sentences.cn: 检察员掏出手帕，擦了擦眉头。

sentences.en: The story is told through the eyes of Inspector Simon Potter.
sentences.cn: 这个故事是从西蒙·波特巡官的视角讲述的。

sentences.en: You can go home afterwards and watch Inspector Morse in colour.
sentences.cn: 之后你就可以回家，看彩色版的电视连续剧《摩斯警长》。

words.tran_cn: 检查员；视察团；检查员的辖区

phrases.tran_cn: 警察分局局；派出所所长

trans.tran_cn: 检查员，（英国公共汽车或火车上的）查票员，（警察）巡官，检阅官
trans.tran_en: an official whose job is to check that something is satisfactory and that rules are being obeyed
